attributes.action: Provide a free school meal for all children and young people in education.
attributes.additional_details:
There have been many campaigns and statistical information gathered that demonstrates how a hot school meal for children and young people in state funded education,  supports both their educational progress and personal wellbeing.  

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/184047/DFE-RR227.pdf

https://www.childrenssociety.org.uk/what-you-can-do/campaign-change/fair-and-square-free-school-meals-all-children-poverty
attributes.background:
It is well known that in the UK there are many parents who can be classified as the working poor.  

These parents are on a low wage however do not qualify for certain benefits such as free school meals because their earnings reach by a small margin above the thresholds
